name: i3-status-gitlab
description: Build status monitor for gitlab-ci and i3-status

scripts.test: npm run compile && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register test --recursive --reporter gitlablist-mocha
scripts.watch: npm run compile && (babel -w src/ -d lib -s &) && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register test --recursive  --reporter min --watch
scripts.cover: npm run compile && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --colors --reporter dot test/ --recursive

author: Christian Fehmer
